commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I hear screaming. Did something happen?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Hi there, Rin.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Mari?! Waaauugh! You're gonna outpace meee!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: You don't have to try so hard to escape me. I'll feel so alone. Let's just leisurely make our way through the race.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Leisurely and race don't go together! I'll shake you off at the next curve!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: I thought you might be like that.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Oh! Would you look at that adorable black spotted kitty over there!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Kitty?!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Where? Where's the kitty? Kittyyyyyy!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Sorry, Rin... If you want to win, you've got to harden your heart and be prepared to trick your friends... Anyway, bye!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Oh, Elichika!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: I thought you'd show up.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Oh, did you? Did you wait for me? I'm so happy! It's just the two of us in this race now. We can keep going for a one-two finish!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: *Giggle* And I'm sure you don't intend to be the "two" in that scenario, right?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Oh, I wouldn't say that. I don't mind coming second under you, Eli. Actually--

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Didn't you fall during dance practice the other day and injure your back? You were wobbling along like a baby deer for a while there. Wasn't that rough?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: It was. You're well-informed.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: How humiliating that must have been for you. I completely get why you're rush... Huh?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Right, right... I have something I want to say to you, too. Kanan sent me an interesting picture yesterday... A picture of you.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: A picture of...me? From Kanan?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: The moment I saw it, I burst out laughing and couldn't stop! That's the kind of picture only someone who's known you forever could take... Pff, hahahahaha!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Hey! What kind of picture did Kanan send to make you crack up so much?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Wait, is it a picture of when I accidentally ate a croquette with fermented soybeans mixed in instead of minced meat?! Or when I woke up with a puffy face with sheet wrinkles on it?!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Oh, that might have happened too!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Too?!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Mm-hmm. Once this race is over, I'll show it to Rin and the rest. It'd be a shame if I were the only one who got to enjoy such funny pictures.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: H-H-Hey! Hold on a second!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Hmm?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Someone's coming... Is that Rin? Or did Setsu and Hanamaru catch up?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: No. It's me!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: R... Rina?!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Now's when I show you how stubborn someone in last place can be. I'll be taking the number one spot!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Rina-chan Booster, "Maximum Acceleration!"

commands.speaker: Eli, Mari
commands.line: Whaaaaaaat?!
